sentences.en: A: You're working tonight as well? Don't overdo it.
sentences.cn: 你今晚也要工作? 别工作过头了.

sentences.en: Analysts believe that worries about the economy are overdone.
sentences.cn: 分析人士认为对经济的担忧有些过火了。

sentences.en: But some a time is still a do - it - yourself are getting more overdo.
sentences.cn: 但是有些时候还是自己做过了头.

sentences.en: Don't overdo it though. Too much zinc can lower levels of HDL, the " good " cholesterol.
sentences.cn: 不过不可吃过量, 因为太多的锌能降低高密度脂蛋白( “ 好 ” 胆固醇)的水平.

sentences.en: Don't overdo the garlic in the food not everyone likes it.
sentences.cn: 蒜别放太多--不是人人都喜欢的.

sentences.en: Don't overdo the salt in your cooking.
He wasn't going to overdo it, but those two boys were going to earn their salt.
sentences.cn: 他不想做得太过分, 可是这两个男孩以后得自食其力.

sentences.en: I dare say I overdo it. But I think you go to the other extreme.
sentences.cn: 我敢说我做的过分了, 但是我想你走到另一极端了.

sentences.en: I'm being careful not to overdo it.
sentences.cn: 我得谨慎小心,不能说过头.

sentences.en: It's a good thing to be polite but you needn't overdo it.
sentences.cn: 有礼貌是好事,但不要过分.

sentences.en: Many people tend to overdo their exercise programs looking for quick results.
sentences.cn: 有些人倾向过度锻炼达到更快的效果.

sentences.en: Stay away from work till next Tuesday, and don't overdo things.
sentences.cn: 休息到下星期二, 而且不要过度劳累.

sentences.en: The taxi drivers' association is urging its members, who can work as many hours as they want, not to overdo it.
sentences.cn: 出租车司机协会劝告那些工作时长不受限制的会员不要疲劳驾驶。

sentences.en: Use a few drawings and photographs, but don’t overdo it.
sentences.cn: 可使用一些图画和照片，但不要太多。

sentences.en: Work hard but don't overdo it.
You do need a staff - so long as you don't overdo it.
sentences.cn: 办事人员确实是需要的,只是不能搞得太庞大了.

sentences.en: You should work hard, but don't overdo it and make yourself iii.
sentences.cn: 你应该努力工作, 但不可过度把自己累病了.

words.tran_cn: 煮得太久的；做得过分的
过分打扮的；穿着过于讲究的
过于热切的，过于渴望的
超速档；[机] 超速传动
把…煮得过久；过于劳累；把…做得过度（overdo的过去分词）
穿得过分讲究；穿得过多
过分夸大；过分戏剧性地表达
过度装饰；使穿著过分讲究
驱使过度；虐待；工作过度

trans.tran_cn: 把…做得过分；使过于疲劳；对…表演过火；夸张
trans.tran_en: to do something more than is suitable or natural

trans.tran_cn: 做得过分，使过于疲劳，夸张，耗尽
trans.tran_en: to do something more than is suitable or natural
